titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation commanding the due execution and observance of certaine orders lately published concerning contributions
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Oxford, the eight day of May, in the twentieth yeare of our reigne. 1644."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
